item.title: Gadwal District Judge Urges Public to Utilize National Lok Adalat on September 13
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District Principal Judge and Chairman of the District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), Justice N. Premalatha, has appealed to the people of Gadwal district to make the best use of the National Lok Adalat scheduled to be held on Saturday, September 13, at the Gadwal court premises for the speedy settlement of pending cases.
Speaking to the media on Wednesday in her chambers, along with Principal Senior Civil Judge and DLSA Secretary V. Srinivas, Justice Premalatha emphasized that the Lok...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Three Killed, Two Injured in Lightning Strike at Bhoompuram Village, Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Jogulamba Gadwal District witnessed a tragic incident on Tuesday when three persons, including two women and a young man, lost their lives after being struck by lightning. The mishap occurred in Bhoompuram village of Aija mandal while they were working in cotton fields.
According to local sources, a group of villagers was engaged in sowing seed cotton when heavy rains accompanied by thunderstorms lashed the area. Suddenly, a powerful lightning bolt struck the field, killing Parvathamma ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
